text: The women's 10,000 metres walk event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 20 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Lyudmila Yefimkina ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Tatyana Kozlova ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Sabine Zimmer ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
